title: TF 100% draw yellow card!!! HACK!!!!!!!  RIOT PLEASE HELP!!!!!
body: Download a program which makes your TF 100% draw yellow card!!!!! can anyone fix it plz!!!!!  RIOT HELP PLEASE!!!!!

replies.body: Lol that hack would be giving you terrible sustain in lane.
Yellow card is not always the best choice. Bad Hack, in any case whatsoever

Hey Terryyao!

Don't panic :)

For reporting issues like hacks, check out http://www.riotgames.com/security-vulnerability-reporting. It's a great place to safely report things like exploitative third-party applications without exposing the forums to that sort of stuff.
It's not like its hard to pick the right card each time. Yellow is always the last card in the order. May just have incredible timing. Jumping to "It's a hack!" isn't the best thing to do.
no matter which card you draw, its always yellow
so you say that with this program always when you press w you automaticaly get the yellow card already active (so you just press w auto someone ant they get stunned without you pressing w again ?)
when you say something to me, that means you DO CARE  :P
GUYS OMG, LIKE I SAID ITS A HACK PROGRAM THAT CAN BE DOWNLOAD FROM INTERNET. NO MATTER WHICH CARD YOU DRAW, ITS ALWAYS YELLOW.

It would probably help if you had a video or something to showcase the hack in action.

While that sounds very frustrating having an always gold card. It sounds more like a disadvantage than an advantage. That's just my personal opinion.
or hes good at pulling yellow cards. you may never know.
if you can read chinese, good for you
hack new update...........omfg...........TF's E, which is a passive ability, now become active..........100% yellow card.............W keeps the same..........
